ThingDef.label: Taurus Judge
ThingDef.description: Ancient revolver designed for self-defense. Fires a powerful pistol cartridge as well as small shotgun shells.

ThingDef.label: P7
ThingDef.description: Ancient pistol design. Used to be popular with police forces due to its compact size.

ThingDef.label: USAS-12
ThingDef.description: Ancient assault shotgun designed for full-auto fire in close quarters.

ThingDef.label: KRISS Vector
ThingDef.description: A uniquely shaped, lightweight SMG designed for close-quarters fighting.

ThingDef.label: FN FAL
ThingDef.description: Ancient military assault rifle firing a full-power rifle cartridge.

ThingDef.label: SKS
ThingDef.description: Ancient battle rifle. Fires an intermediate rifle cartridge and is a popular choice for long-range engagements.

ThingDef.label: AK-47
ThingDef.description: Ancient military weapon chambered for an intermediate cartridge. The simple design makes it easy to assemble and gives it high reliability.

ThingDef.label: AK-12
ThingDef.description: Ancient assault rifle design with a special high capacity magazine.

ThingDef.label: AKS-74U
ThingDef.description: Ancient sub-carbine design, combining the compactness of an SMG with the armor-piercing capabilities of a rifle round.

ThingDef.label: SVD
ThingDef.description: Sniper rifle with a fairly simple assembly. It is known for its reliability.

ThingDef.label: Tac-50
ThingDef.description: Ancient bolt-action anti-materiel rifle. Combines a large caliber cartridge with a high-magnification scope for sniping at extreme range.

ThingDef.label: PTRS-41
ThingDef.description: Ancient anti-tank rifle, originally designed for use against primitive armored vehicles. Fires a very powerful cartridge but the large size and weight make it unwieldy.

ThingDef.label: M60
ThingDef.description: A belt-fed general-purpose machine gun. Lots of firepower but heavy and cumbersome to carry around. Commonly nicknamed "The Pig".

ThingDef.label: RPD
ThingDef.description: Ancient light machine gun design. The precursor to modern squad automatic weapons, it is comparatively light for a weapon of its class.

ThingDef.label: PKM
ThingDef.description: Ancient general-purpose machine gun. The rugged design makes it a popular weapon for the people inhabiting Rimworlds.

ThingDef.label: RPG-7
ThingDef.description: A short rocket-propelled grenade launcher that fires single projectiles which explode on impact. A relatively very cheap, multiple use alternative to single-shot launchers.

ThingDef.label: M72 LAW
ThingDef.description: A lightweight single-use anti-tank launcher. Designed to provide soldiers in the field with a compact anti-armor weapon.

ThingDef.label: Milkor MGL
ThingDef.description: Ancient, man-portable grenade launcher. The 6-shot cylinder allows for a relatively high volume of fire.

ThingDef.label: L-20 LMG
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot light machine gun designed for suppression.

ThingDef.label: R-11 precision rifle
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot sniper rifle equipped with advanced optics for long-range shooting.

ThingDef.label: RM2 Flamethrower
ThingDef.description: Unconventional flamethrower design that uses replaceable canisters of pressurized fuel canisters instead of a back-mounted tank. Less encumbering but needs to reload frequently.
